Translations.Text: Night Destiny je lepsie than 1000 mesiac
angels Spirit zostupit therein ich Lord's vlavo beriem kazdy command
Those disbelieved among the ludia z scripture i mat rad idol worshipers insist ich ways proof dat them
Posol z GOD reciting them sacred instrukcia
Do them there bol valuable teachings
Skutocne those received scripture nie dispute proof dat them
All ziadat z them je kult GOD devoting nabozenstvo absolutely Him alone observe zmluva prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat)! Such je zdokonalit nabozenstvo
Those disbelieved among the ludia z scripture idol worshipers incurred zapalit Gehenna forever They je zly creatures
Those verit led righteous zivot je dobre creatures
